greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integer partitions of n whose length times maximum is a multiple of n.
comment: The Heinz numbers of these partitions are given by A326848.
link: Fausto A. C. Cariboni, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..160
example: For example, (4,1,1) is such a partition because its length times maximum is 3 * 4 = 12, which is a multiple of 6.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jul 26 2019
